name: Space Invaders (itch) (Zepix)
description:
It's a simple game with space invader's gameplay.

Kill ennemies with your spaceship.

CONTROLS :

Directionnals Arrows to move your spaceship (Left and Right)

SPACEBAR to fire

/\ The shot cooldown is 1sec /\

LEVELS :

After killing all ennemies, you'll pass a level

There is x ennemies at the level x

INFORMATIONS :

This game was made in Python, with the Pygame library and exported with cx_freeze

I did this game cause I wanted to try Pygame and his efficiency

I upload my game to have a feedback from users and developpers, I'm just starting to create games

You can check all of my games at http://zepixgames.com/jeux.html
